meanings.definition: To take great pleasure or delight in something.
meanings.sent1: She was delectating the beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent2: He always delectates in spending time with his family.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was delectating the squeaky toy with pure joy.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes delectated in the sight of the colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The children delectated in the fun of playing in the park.

meanings.definition: The act of enjoying something delicious.
meanings.sent1: The delectating of the chocolate cake was evident on her face.
meanings.sent2: The delectating of the ice cream brought smiles to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The delectating of the warm apple pie made the room smell amazing.
meanings.sent4: The delectating of the fresh strawberries was a delightful experience.
meanings.sent5: The delectating of the homemade cookies filled the kitchen with happiness.
